hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I've got a full-time job dison.medincn.com JulianneÂ and Chloe are co-starring in the MGM and Screen Gems modern-day adaptation of the classic Stephen King novel Carrie, which was originally made into a 1976 movie directed by Brian De Palma. In Carrie,Â JulianneÂ portrays a strict mother with twisted religious beliefs who has shunned contact with people out of fear of committing any sins and instilled in her daughter the same fear. The daughter grows up terribly shy and is bullied in school for her lack of social skills. The movie and the book are famous for the climactic scene when Carrie finally gets her revenge against her tormentors. At the press screening that this writer attended, the audience loudly cheered for Carrie as she unleashed her hidden powers.
